hero.title: Your business expansion happens here
hero.subtitle: Discover our success cases
hero.description: SLR Engineering is the right choice to materialize your projects with speed and excellence, operating in Design & Build and Turn Key models, delivering complete solutions from start to finish.

about.title: We build
about.subtitle: From concept to delivery, we are driven by transforming spaces.
about.description: At SLR Engineering, our purpose is to ensure that each client has a complete, safe and peaceful experience throughout the construction journey, from concept to ready space. Specialists in retail, corporate floors and franchises, we act with protagonism in Design & Build and Turn Key models, managing all stages with precision: approvals, project development, execution, supplies and third-party management.
about.description2: We combine technical excellence, agility and responsibility to transform ideas into environments ready to operate, with one contract, one partner and the commitment to deliver more than agreed.

card1.title: Foundation
card1.subtitle: SLR Engineering is born.
card1.description: We started our journey focused on quality, agility and commitment, working on residential, commercial and corporate projects.

card2.title: Structuring and Consolidation.
card2.subtitle: More than 120 projects delivered in Brazil.
card2.description: With qualified technical team and optimized processes, we consolidated our operation in various segments.

card3.title: Total Focus on B2B.
card3.subtitle: Specialists in retail and corporate.
card3.description: SLR starts operating exclusively in the B2B market, delivering high-end stores and offices throughout the country.

card4.title: International Expansion.
card4.subtitle: We arrived in Latin America and Europe.
card4.description: SLR goes beyond borders! We take our agile and efficient model to Argentina, Chile, Uruguay and Portugal, serving international retail.

card5.title: Presence in the USA.
card5.subtitle: Consolidated international operation.
card5.description: We expanded to the United States, executing projects for Brazilian and global brands.

card6.title: Global Presence.
card6.subtitle: SLR in the Americas and Europe.
card6.description: With capacity for 300 projects per year, we continue growing with focus on B2B, retail and corporate projects, throughout South, Central, North America and Europe.

values.title: Our Values

intelligence-quotient.title: Goal without method is just madness
intelligence-quotient.description: Here, every ambition is accompanied by process, intelligence and impeccable execution.

passion.title: Passion for challenges
passion.description: We don't move for the easy. We are moved by the new, the big and the difficult. We transform ideas into reality with creativity, curiosity and determination. We always seek the best result – with grit, technical excellence and courage to get out of the obvious.

warning.title: Sense of urgency and consistency
warning.description: Agility with intelligence. Speed with criteria. We anticipate needs, foresee problems and act with empathy, discipline and method. For us, every decision counts – in time, cost and impact.

teamwork.title: Collaboration that delivers
teamwork.description: No solid result is built alone. We act as one team, with dialogue, transparency and focus on the client. Together, we deliver more than agreed – on time, with quality and responsibility.

superhero.title: Excellence with protagonist attitude
superhero.description: We act with genuine commitment. We plan with precision, execute with competence and correct with agility. We take responsibility for each delivery, because we know it represents our brand, the client's trust – and the future of our company.

values.description2: We work on construction and renovation projects for offices, retail stores and franchise networks throughout the national territory.

cases.title: Cases
cases.subtitle: Projects that build results
cases.description: Our projects go beyond physical delivery, they transform spaces into strategic assets. With more than 1,000 projects delivered in Brazil and Latin America, we expanded our operations to the United States, always focusing on efficiency, aggressive deadlines and technical excellence. Specialists in corporate and retail projects, we serve companies that seek agility, standardization and quality to grow with security, scale and predictability.
cases.title2: Your corporate space, your next achievement
cases.cta2: Discover how we transformed this office

case1.title: V4 Company
case1.description: Workplace transformation for V4 Company: more productivity and comfort.
case1.description2: The project involved the renovation of a 1,200 m² office, focusing on meeting areas, waiting room and work areas. SLR Engineering delivered a modern, functional and welcoming environment, with high-quality materials and timeless design. The result was a complete transformation of the space, with an environment that reflects the company's brand and culture.

form-contato.title: Let's build the future of your company.
form-contato.subtitle: Together.
form-contato.description: Talk to one of our specialists and start your project today.
form-contato.description2: Need to build, renovate or expand your operation? Whether it's a new construction, renovation or expansion, the SLR Engineering team is ready to understand your needs and deliver the best solution.
form-contato.description3: Fill out the form on the side or contact us through one of our channels.

about-us.title: Building ideas.
about-us.description: (Create text about SLR: more details about operation and places where it is present.) Example text: Our projects start from a narrative that begins in the field of ideas, and concludes at the moment when the space breathes for the first time. At SLR Engineering, in addition to delivering completely finished spaces, we conduct our clients' entire journey. From concept to result, we design processes so that each client goes through their construction with security, clarity and tranquility.
about-us.description2: We are specialists in retail, corporate floors and franchises. We act with protagonism in Design & Build and Turn Key models, orchestrating each stage such as: approvals, projects, execution, supplies and third-party management.
about-us.description3: We combine technical precision, agility and responsibility. We transform ideas into spaces ready to operate, with a single contract, a single partner and the certainty of always delivering beyond.
about-us.visao-description: To be recognized as a leading engineering company in Latin America, delivering innovative and sustainable solutions that exceed our clients' expectations.
about-us.missao-description: To provide high-quality engineering services, from design to construction, ensuring total satisfaction of our clients through an integral, efficient and sustainable approach.
about-us.valores-description: Passion for challenges, which drives us to seek innovative solutions; collaborative work, promoting union and synergy in our team; sense of urgency and importance, ensuring we deliver results at the right time; and excellence, committed to quality in everything we do.
about-us.description4: [Add text about the team in general]: Our projects start from a narrative that begins in the field of ideas, and concludes at the moment when the space breathes for the first time. At SLR Engineering, in addition to delivering completely finished spaces, we conduct our clients' entire journey. From concept to result, we design processes so that each client goes through their construction with security, clarity and tranquility.

turn-key.title: Turn Key
turn-key.subtitle: for Retail & Office
turn-key.description: The Turn Key model is ideal for projects that require total management of the construction process, from conception to final delivery. Our team assumes all responsibility, from project approval to delivery of the space ready for operation.
turn-key.description2: The Turn Key model takes integration to a level where every detail of the work is centralized in a single partner. The entire chain, executive project, supplies, third-party management, execution and final finishes, is conducted under a single coordination, which eliminates dispersed decision points and reduces failure risks. The client receives a completed environment, technically validated and ready to start operation on the defined deadline. This approach offers maximum simplicity, with predictable deadlines, controlled costs and the security that the space will be delivered exactly as planned, already ready to function from the first day.
turn-key.description3: A single partner coordinates all stages: project, supplies, execution and third-party management. Elimination of multiple decision points and risk reduction.
turn-key.description4: Finished space, technically validated and ready for immediate operation. Deadlines and costs defined with predictability.
turn-key.description5: Single control ensures quality and compliance at each stage. The client receives the completed work without additional management effort.
turn-key.example: This model is especially strategic for expanding companies, retail networks and franchises, as it allows replicating units with consistency and predictability, reducing the time between the decision to open a new operation and the effective start of activities.

design-build.title: Design-Build
design-build.description: The Design & Build model integrates project and execution in a single contract. This means that planning, architecture, engineering, supplies and construction are conducted in a coordinated way, reducing risks, deadlines and costs. This model ensures that the environment is ready to operate from the first day, aligned with the brand and consumer experience, in addition to allowing scalable and standardized business expansion.
design-build.subtitle: Direct benefits for the client:

benefit1.title: Feasibility
benefit1.description: Detailed briefings to ensure correct technical and financial decisions.

benefit2.title: Project
benefit2.description: Personalized solutions that translate the brand identity.

benefit3.title: Construction
benefit3.description: Complete management of construction sites and suppliers, ensuring predictability.

benefit4.title: Retrofit
benefit4.description: Modernization of spaces in operation with minimal impact.
